amendment.description: To prohibit the application of certain restrictive eligibility requirements to foreign nongovernmental organizations with respect to the provision of assistance under part I of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

action.text: Amendment SA 278 proposed by Senator Boxer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 278 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 83.
